title: Wary Geographic Neighbor
description: Our properties lie in close proximity (148 meters apart), creating a geographic connection that cannot be ignored, yet our relationship is marked by significant distrust (-25.98 TrustScore) despite a strong connection (207.07 StrengthScore). As a Facchini-class citizen with limited resources (9,003 Ducats), Miles4lf represents a potential social welfare concern given their proximity to my numerous properties and business interests in the area.
